rules_text: Aetherfission deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead. If you control two or more permanents with counters on them, Aetherfission deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text:
[i]“Don't worry, this won't hurt. Or at least no one will hear you scream if it does.”
—Vernus Prioleau, Master Tinker[/i]
